mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, album_name AS albumName, album_desc AS albumDesc, album_template_id AS albumTemplateId, private_view AS privateView, private_key AS privateKey, created_by AS createdBy, created_date AS createdDate, last_modified_by AS lastModifiedBy, last_modified_date AS lastModifiedDate, is_del AS isDel FROM album_instance
(IS_DEL = 0 OR IS_DEL IS NULL) and user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
